column4: Hello I have a quick question about netbook edition: I have a 64 bit netbook and I'd like to be able to use a 64 bit version, but I don't see an x64 netbook ( go figure, I think my proccessor is the only 64 bit atom ). Is there a reason I should use netbook instead of desktop x64?
don't see an x64 netbook edition*
you could use just desktop edition and install unity after installing
Do I need to do anything special to install unity or can I just install the desktop edition and apt-get or something?
